teal.ui.swing

Class SplashWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • javax.swing.JWindow
            • teal.ui.swing.SplashWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer

    public class SplashWindow
extends javax.swing.JWindow
    A General purpose Splash Window for display while during application startup. The window contains an image and can display text messages to mark progress of application startup.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    mesrob, Andrew McKinney, Phil Bailey, Michael Danziger
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
